periods.name: Today
periods.shortForecast: Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Sunny. High near 98, with temperatures falling to around 95 in the afternoon. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 75. East southeast wind 1 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
